title: Lagging hard
body: So like i checked my internet speed on google and it said that my ping was fast and that i could handle multiple streaming devices at once, which was true since all the videos that i watched ran perfectly fine and i could watch them at the highest resolution possible. HOWEVER, every time I try to play a game of league, it always gets super laggy and becomes unplayable. This happened for the past 2 days and I really don't know how to fix this issue, since I would restart my internet and it would still lag, but i could still go on youtube and everything would be fine. Please give me suggestions on what to do.

replies.body: Well it's been a few days and it's getting better. Thank you :)

Since you can watch youtube and stream just fine, but league always seems to lag, it might be that your own network is fine but it has a hard time talking with our servers for some reason. Let's rule out some of the possibilities by going through our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

Hit us back up if you're still having problems!
